aboutUs.title: About us
aboutUs.descriptionPartOne: Our system helps clinicians diagnose and monitor bruxism, temporomandibular disorders and other dental problems outside the office.
aboutUs.descriptionPartTwo:
The system consists of a smartphone application and a small wireless electromyographic (EMG) device that the patient wears on the
        lower jaw. The system was created thanks to the work of an international research team.

measure.title: Measuring device
measure.descriptionPartOne: Our EMG machine is designed to measure tooth friction while providing a protective barrier between the teeth.
measure.descriptionPartTwo: These appliances wear as intended with use and can be easily replaced to prevent damage to the dentition.
measure.descriptionPartThree:
The EMG device has been designed especially for people suffering from bruxism who do not show any symptoms of temporomandibular
        joint disorders.
measure.descriptionPartFour:
Single-layer braces fit comfortably against any mouth size and, when positioned, help reduce muscle tension around your mouth while
        you sleep. EMG is easy to shape and recommended for use overnight as well as during the day as long as the patient is rubbing their
        teeth during this time.
